verbose_text: The almost insignificant loss of cell viability induced by trastuzumab in both parental and negative control shRNA transduced cells (i.e., 1% reduction at 1 mug/mL trastuzumab and 8% reduction at 100 mug/mL trastuzumab) were significantly augmented in ATG8 / LC3 shRNA / JIMT1 cells (i.e., from 19% reduction at 1 mug/mL trastuzumab to 30% reduction at 100 mug/mL trastuzumab).
